name: Saints Row IV: Enter the Dominatrix
name_original: Saints Row IV: Enter the Dominatrix
description:
Saints Row IV: Enter the Dominatrix is an action, shooter and racing game developed by Volition. It came out on 22-10-2013. THQ published the game. Most rawgers rated the game as "Meh".
Saints Row IV: Enter the Dominatrix is available on PC and PlayStation 3.
